description:
Race across the Moon, kicking down crystal walls and sliding under chomping moon-slugs! Bound through the Robotic Mines and face off against the MinerMech! Dash through the Big City on a quest to find friends and defeat the final boss together!
- Control CommanderVideo as he runs, jumps, kicks, and slides his way to victory!
- With exciting modern and retro challenges, you can dash your way through more than 50 levels!
- Easy, medium, and hard difficulty modes
- 20 bite-sized challenges separate from the main game
- A boppinâ€™ chiptune-inspired soundtrack with special guest Anamanaguchi!
Join CommanderVideo in BIT.TRIP RUNNER, his most incredible journey yet!
name: BIT.TRIP RUNNER
